TextView.android:text: For Current Month TSI/SR will have to sell minimum 51 bag of Powder or 51 case of X-Act during the month to be eligible for Toilet Soap incentive (i.e. if TSI sells 400 case of Toilet Soap but is unable to sell 51 bags of Powder or 51 cs of X-Act then he will not be eligible for incentive payout.) its mandatory for every TSI to sell a minimum 51 bags of Powder or 51 cases of X-Act.
Payouts will be paid on Secondary Orders shown in Astix app only.

Primary Orders must be equal to Secondary Orders claimed i.e if secondary Orders claimed is 300 boxes of TS Primary Orders must be minimum 300 case else Incentive will be paid on qty whichever is lesser.
Payouts cannot be clubbed for eg. TSI will have to sell 200 cs of Toilet Soap ,50 case of Powder or 50 cases of X-Act to claim the incentive.
Payout will be done on a monthly basis.

The above incentive scheme is on performance of TSI on monthly basis i.e. 1st to 31st of each month (only payments received up to 31st of each month) will be considered, no spill over will be considered.
